categoriesExplanation: The workout video is classified as "Indoor biking" based on clear indicators in the metadata. The title explicitly mentions "Rhythm Cycling Class" and "90s Pop Ride," which describes an indoor cycling workout often associated with spin classes. The channel information further supports this classification, as it describes offering "THE ULTIMATE RHYTHM CYCLING EXPERIENCE" and numerous ride sessions of varying lengths. User comments also frequently mention stationary cycling, cycling as life-changing, and using terms like "Spinners high," reinforcing the primary focus on indoor biking. Given the abundance of evidence aligned with indoor cycling, this category was assigned with a score of 1.0, indicating the central defining characteristic of the workout.
